Klasse Substitution

java.lang.Object
Substitution
public class Substitution extends Object
a substitution contains of a source Variable to and a destination Argument to and works like a replacement

      public Substitution(Variable from, Argument to) throws IllegalArgumentException
      create a new Substitution from a Variable to an Argument
      Parameter:
      from - Variable to substitute
      to - Argument that replaces
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if (from == null) or (to == null) or (to instanceof ?)
